EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2018.London Reminder June 19 Send
EmailTemplate.subject: See you Thursday at SpringOne Tour!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We look forward to seeing you Thursday at SpringOne Tour London <[[http://springonetour.io/2018/london?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-springonetour-london-q218]]>. Please review the event details below and feel free to email the team at springonetour@pivotal.io <[[mailto:springonetour@pivotal.io]]> with any questions. Please be sure to bring your government-issued ID, like a driver's license, with you when you check in.

7:30 pm
Day Ends

Location CodeNode <[[https://skillsmatter.com/event-space]]> 10 South Place <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/CodeNode/@51.5186424,-0.0860117,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0x91b283e2f67d1dbb?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwiNr7-St8zbAhUqrVkKHZChAr4Q_BIIkgEwCg]]> London, EC2M 7EB, GB <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/CodeNode/@51.5186424,-0.0860117,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0x91b283e2f67d1dbb?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwiNr7-St8zbAhUqrVkKHZChAr4Q_BIIkgEwCg]]>

- NCP Finsbury Square, London, EC2A 1AD - NCP Whitechapel High Street, London, E1 7RA
We look forward to seeing you on Thursday! Tasha Isenberg and the SpringOne Tour Team
